verb.description: Leave one's job and cease to work, typically upon reaching the normal age for leaving employment.
examples: he retired from the navy in 1966

verb.description: Withdraw to or from a particular place.
examples: she retired into the bathroom with her toothbrush

verb.description: Withdraw (a bill or note) from circulation or currency.

examples: the debt is to be retired from state gaming-tax receipts

noun.description: A movement in which one leg is bent and raised at right angles to the body until the toe is in line with the knee of the supporting leg.
